items.content_html: Vector databases enable fast similarity search and scale across data points. For LLM apps, vector indexes can simplify architecture over full vector databases by attaching vectors to existing storage. Choosing indexes vs databases depends on specialized needs, existing infrastructure, and broader enterprise requirements.
